column4: Another question: Can I remove linux-headers-* packages ? Are they really used? I never build a custom kernel.
some appz might need those headers, do you use virtual box?
But if they are required, I'd better leave them installed.
i mean, the headers are there for  a reason, some applications need them, virtualbox for example, will not work if the headers are not installed
Oh, I see. Thanks. They are probably used for building kernel modules then
